fields.name: ActualThroughputMibps
fields.description: Actual throughput in MiB/s for auto qosType volumes calculated based on size and serviceLevel

fields.name: AvsDataStore
fields.description: Specifies whether the volume is enabled for Azure VMware Solution (AVS) datastore purpose

fields.name: BackupId
fields.description: UUID v4 or resource identifier used to identify the Backup.

fields.name: BaremetalTenantId
fields.description: Unique Baremetal Tenant Identifier.

fields.name: CapacityPoolResourceId
fields.description: Pool Resource Id used in case of creating a volume through volume group

fields.name: CloneProgress
fields.description: When a volume is being restored from another volume's snapshot, will show the percentage completion of this cloning process. When this value is empty/null there is no cloning process currently happening on this volume. This value will update every 5 minutes during cloning.

fields.name: CoolAccess
fields.description: Specifies whether Cool Access(tiering) is enabled for the volume.

fields.name: CoolnessPeriod
fields.description: Specifies the number of days after which data that is not accessed by clients will be tiered.

fields.name: CreationToken
fields.description: A unique file path for the volume. Used when creating mount targets

fields.name: DataProtection
fields.description: DataProtection type volumes include an object containing details of the replication

fields.name: DataStoreResourceId
fields.description: Data store resource unique identifier

fields.name: DefaultGroupQuotaInKiBs
fields.description: Default group quota for volume in KiBs. If isDefaultQuotaEnabled is set, the minimum value of 4 KiBs applies.

fields.name: DefaultUserQuotaInKiBs
fields.description: Default user quota for volume in KiBs. If isDefaultQuotaEnabled is set, the minimum value of 4 KiBs applies .

fields.name: DeleteBaseSnapshot
fields.description: If enabled (true) the snapshot the volume was created from will be automatically deleted after the volume create operation has finished.  Defaults to false

fields.name: EnableSubvolumes
fields.description: Flag indicating whether subvolume operations are enabled on the volume

fields.name: Encrypted
fields.description: Specifies if the volume is encrypted or not. Only available on volumes created or updated after 2022-01-01.

fields.name: EncryptionKeySource
fields.description: Source of key used to encrypt data in volume. Applicable if NetApp account has encryption.keySource = 'Microsoft.KeyVault'. Possible values (case-insensitive) are: 'Microsoft.NetApp, Microsoft.KeyVault'

fields.name: ExportPolicy
fields.description: Set of export policy rules

fields.name: FileAccessLogs
fields.description: Flag indicating whether file access logs are enabled for the volume, based on active diagnostic settings present on the volume.

fields.name: FileSystemId
fields.description: Unique FileSystem Identifier.

fields.name: IsDefaultQuotaEnabled
fields.description: Specifies if default quota is enabled for the volume.

fields.name: IsLargeVolume
fields.description: Specifies whether volume is a Large Volume or Regular Volume.

fields.name: IsRestoring
fields.description: Restoring

fields.name: KerberosEnabled
fields.description: Describe if a volume is KerberosEnabled. To be use with swagger version 2020-05-01 or later

fields.name: KeyVaultPrivateEndpointResourceId
fields.description: The resource ID of private endpoint for KeyVault. It must reside in the same VNET as the volume. Only applicable if encryptionKeySource = 'Microsoft.KeyVault'.

fields.name: LdapEnabled
fields.description: Specifies whether LDAP is enabled or not for a given NFS volume.

fields.name: MaximumNumberOfFiles
fields.description: Maximum number of files allowed. Needs a service request in order to be changed. Only allowed to be changed if volume quota is more than 4TiB.

fields.name: MountTargets
fields.description: List of mount targets

fields.name: NetworkFeatures
fields.description: Basic network, or Standard features available to the volume.

fields.name: NetworkSiblingSetId
fields.description: Network Sibling Set ID for the the group of volumes sharing networking resources.

fields.name: OriginatingResourceId
fields.description: Id of the snapshot or backup that the volume is restored from.

fields.name: PlacementRules
fields.description: Application specific placement rules for the particular volume

fields.name: ProtocolTypes
fields.description: Set of protocol types, default NFSv3, CIFS for SMB protocol

fields.name: ProvisionedAvailabilityZone
fields.description: The availability zone where the volume is provisioned. This refers to the logical availability zone where the volume resides.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Azure lifecycle management

fields.name: ProximityPlacementGroup
fields.description: Proximity placement group associated with the volume

fields.name: SecurityStyle
fields.description: The security style of volume, default unix, defaults to ntfs for dual protocol or CIFS protocol

fields.name: SmbAccessBasedEnumeration
fields.description: Enables access based enumeration share property for SMB Shares. Only applicable for SMB/DualProtocol volume

fields.name: SmbContinuouslyAvailable
fields.description: Enables continuously available share property for smb volume. Only applicable for SMB volume

fields.name: SmbEncryption
fields.description: Enables encryption for in-flight smb3 data. Only applicable for SMB/DualProtocol volume. To be used with swagger version 2020-08-01 or later

fields.name: SmbNonBrowsable
fields.description: Enables non browsable property for SMB Shares. Only applicable for SMB/DualProtocol volume

fields.name: SnapshotDirectoryVisible
fields.description: If enabled (true) the volume will contain a read-only snapshot directory which provides access to each of the volume's snapshots (defaults to true).

fields.name: SnapshotId
fields.description: UUID v4 or resource identifier used to identify the Snapshot.

fields.name: StorageToNetworkProximity
fields.description: Provides storage to network proximity information for the volume.

fields.name: SubnetId
fields.description: The Azure Resource URI for a delegated subnet. Must have the delegation Microsoft.NetApp/volumes

fields.name: T2Network
fields.description: T2 network information

fields.name: UnixPermissions
fields.description: UNIX permissions for NFS volume accepted in octal 4 digit format. First digit selects the set user ID(4), set group ID (2) and sticky (1) attributes. Second digit selects permission for the owner of the file: read (4), write (2) and execute (1). Third selects permissions for other users in the same group. the fourth for other users not in the group. 0755 - gives read/write/execute permissions to owner and read/execute to group and other users.

fields.name: UsageThreshold
fields.description: Maximum storage quota allowed for a file system in bytes. This is a soft quota used for alerting only. Minimum size is 100 GiB. Upper limit is 100TiB, 500Tib for LargeVolume. Specified in bytes.

fields.name: VolumeGroupName
fields.description: Volume Group Name

fields.name: VolumeSpecName
fields.description: Volume spec name is the application specific designation or identifier for the particular volume in a volume group for e.g. data, log

fields.name: VolumeType
fields.description: What type of volume is this. For destination volumes in Cross Region Replication, set type to DataProtection
